translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not settle down on the view of morality.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya ste /
translated: In this regard, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not be discouraged by thinking, ‘All phenomena are empty.’

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi /
translated: Because all phenomena are empty of their own characteristics,

original: stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo //
translated: but not empty of emptiness.

original: zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not be discouraged by thinking, ‘All phenomena are empty.’

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste /
translated: In this regard, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not contradict emptiness.

original: 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because emptiness is empty of its own characteristic, emptiness does not contradict emptiness.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings should not contradict emptiness.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang @267b stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang @267b stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste /
translated: “In this regard, how should bodhisattva great beings realize emptiness?

original: 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi /
analyzed: 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi /
translated: It is like this: emptiness is empty of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Emptiness should not realize emptiness.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings should realize emptiness.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byas gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byas gang zhe na /
translated: “In this regard, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ realization of signlessness?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o //
translated: not attending to any phenomena.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “In this regard, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ knowledge of wishlessness?

original: gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: It is not abiding in any sentient beings of the three realms.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s purification of the three spheres?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: the completion of the path of the ten virtuous actions.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rjes yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rjes yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s completion of compassion for all beings?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: snying rje chen po thob pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po thob pa'o //
translated: attaining great compassion.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva-mahāsattva not despise any being?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the field of beings is purified.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s view of the sameness of all phenomena?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: chos thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all phenomena are neither increased nor decreased.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ realization of the authentic way consist in?

original: gang @268a *// chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang @268a *// chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the non-realization of all phenomena.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ acceptance of the unborn consist in?

original: gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste /
analyzed: gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste /
translated: It is the acceptance that all phenomena are unborn, unceasing, and unconditioned.

original: de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o //
translated: This is the acceptance of the unborn.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ knowledge of the unborn consist in?

original: gang ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste /
translated: It is the knowledge that names and forms are unborn.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ knowledge of the unborn.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ teaching of a single way consist in?

original: gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de /
translated: It is the absence of dualistic engagement with phenomena.

original: de ni tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ni tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the one method.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s destruction of conceptualization?

original: gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of conceptualization about all phenomena.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s reversal of views?

original: gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'o //
translated: It is the reversal of all śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha views.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s reversal of the kleśas?

original: gang bag chags dang; mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: gang bag chags dang; mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of all traces, connections, and kleśas.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s level of śamatha and vipaśyanā?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: @268b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: @268b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: the wisdom of omniscience.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ disciplined mind consist in?

original: gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of delight in the three realms.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ peaceful mind consist in?

original: gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o //
translated: It is the absence of distraction from the six sense sources.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ unobstructed knowledge consist in?

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o //
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o //
translated: It is the attainment of the eye of the buddhas.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ knowledge that does not engage with attachment consist in?

original: skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'o //
translated: It is the equanimity of the six sense sources.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ ability to go wherever they wish in their buddha field consist in?

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang der lus ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang der lus ston pa'o //
translated: It is the display of their bodies in this and that circle of followers.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ knowledge of the minds of all beings consist in?

original: gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the minds and mental states of all beings through a single mind.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ play with superknowledge consist in?

original: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir /🔽mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir / mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /
translated: It is the play with superknowledge in order to see the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la /
translated: It is the play with superknowledge in which one travels from buddha realm to buddha realm

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o //🔽de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @269a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @269a *//
translated: without ever developing the notion of a buddha.

original: po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ vision of the buddha realms consist in?

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g-yos la /
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g-yos la /
translated: It is the vision of the buddha realms without ever leaving one’s own buddha realm.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang snang zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang snang zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o //
translated: and they appear in all buddha-fields without conceiving the notion of a buddha-field.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s accomplishment of the buddha-fields as they have been seen?

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas /
translated: It is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s accomplishment of the buddha-fields as they have been seen when, having attained the level of a sovereign king ruling over the great billion-world universe,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: he gives up the entire great billion-world universe in order to ripen beings,

original: des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa'o //
translated: and he does not become proud on that account.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s service to the Buddha?

original: sems can thams cad yongs su dgos pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su dgos pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //
translated: It is the service to the Dharma in order to ripen all beings.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brten pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brten pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s correct understanding of the body of the Buddha?

original: chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o //
translated: It is the correct understanding of the body of the Dharma.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na /🔽stobs bcu la gnas nas /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na / stobs bcu la gnas nas /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the higher and the lower faculties?

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi @269b zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi @269b zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s purification of the buddhafield?

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the purification of the minds of all beings by means of the principle of nonapprehending.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s illusion-like samādhi?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas /
translated: It is the samādhi in which bodhisattva mahāsattvas abide and

original: bya ba thams cad byed la /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad byed la /
translated: perform all activities,

original: de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: but their minds do not engage with any phenomena.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ uninterrupted samādhi?

original: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: It is the samādhi that arises from the ripening of bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na /
translated: “How do bodhisattva mahāsattvas take on a body that is in accordance with the roots of virtue of sentient beings?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Here bodhisattva mahāsattvas take on a body as they wish, in accordance with the ripening of sentient beings.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsam bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsam bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na /
translated: How do bodhisattva great beings take up existence as they wish?

original: 'di lta ste /

original: dmigs so // skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dmigs so // skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, non-purification, and non-conditioning are not apprehended because of not apprehending non-conditioning.

original: de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pas de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pas de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Suchness is not apprehended because of not apprehending suchness.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
translated: The very limit of reality is not apprehended because the very limit of reality is non-apprehensible.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas /
translated: The perfection of giving is not apprehended because the perfection of giving is non-apprehensible.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //🔽nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so // nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are not apprehended because the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is not apprehended because the emptiness of internal phenomena is non-apprehensible.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not apprehended because the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs su med pas lam mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs su med pas lam mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the path are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the path.

original: de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa @286b bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa @286b bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The stream enterer is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pas dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pas dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The once-returner, the non-returner, and the worthy one are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a worthy one.

original: rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pas rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pas rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
translated: The pratyekabuddha is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a pratyekabuddha.🔽The bodhisattva is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a bodhisattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas /
translated: up to the Tathāgata is non-apprehensible,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: therefore the Tathāgata is non-apprehensible.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are non-apprehensible, therefore unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du sa dmigs su med pas rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sa dmigs su med pas rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the Joyful level is non-apprehensible because the level is non-apprehensible,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dmigs su med pas dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang; 'od 'phro can dang / shin tu sbyang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / mi g-yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dmigs su med pas dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang; 'od 'phro can dang / shin tu sbyang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / mi g-yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang /
translated: the Stainless level, the Radiant level, the Flaming level, the Very Difficult to Conquer level, the Face-to-Face level, the Far-­Reaching level, the Immovable level, the Excellent Intelligence level,

original: chos kyi sprin gyi sa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi sprin gyi sa mi dmigs so //
translated: and the Cloud of Dharma level are non-apprehensible because the level is non-apprehensible.

original: gzhan yang sa dmigs su med pas sa bcu mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang sa dmigs su med pas sa bcu mi dmigs te /
translated: Moreover, the ten levels are non-apprehensible because the level is non-apprehensible.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: sa dang po dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i @287a *//
analyzed: sa dang po dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i @287a *//
translated: the first level, the level of seeing what is white, the level of the lineage, the eighth level, the level of seeing, the level of thinning,🔽the level of separation from desire, the level of realizing what is to be done, the pratyekabuddha level, the bodhisattva level, and the buddha level.

original: sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa ste; nang stong pa nyid kyis sa dang po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa ste; nang stong pa nyid kyis sa dang po mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the first level is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa dang po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa dang po mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the first level is not apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa bcu'i bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa bcu'i bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, and because of the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the ten levels are not apprehended, because they are utterly pure.🔽“

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “Because of their utter purity, they do not apprehend the bringing of beings to maturity through the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to and through the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi dmigs so //

translated: “Because of their utter purity, they do not apprehend the purification of a buddhafield through the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to and through the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mig lnga mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mig lnga mi dmigs so //
translated: “Because of their utter purity, they do not apprehend the five eyes through the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to and through the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that, by way of not apprehending anything, will go forth into the knowledge of all aspects by means of the Great Vehicle.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

translated: “Lord, if all dharmas are empty of all dharmas, how will bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom go forth into the knowledge of all aspects?”
